section: Provider shall maintain records relating to the provision of the Services under this Agreement.
explanation: This imposes a general obligation on the Provider to maintain records. There is no further explanation what records are required or how long the records must be kept. This creates ambiguity as the the nature of the records required.

section: Recipient shall own all rights, title, and interest in any invention, technique, process, device, discovery, improvement, or know-how made by Provider which results from the Services.
explanation: This clause purports to assign all intellectual property rights in anything created by the Provider during the provision of services to the Recipient. The breadth of this clause is overly broad and may be unenforceable, as it doesn't specify any limitations regarding the connection between the invention and the services provided.

section: As consideration for provision of the Services following the Effective Date, Recipient shall pay Provider an amount for providing the Services. In addition to such amount, Recipient shall reimburse Provider for out-of-pocket expenses.
explanation: This section states that the Recipient will pay the Provider an amount for providing the services but it does not specify the amount that will be paid to the provider and the section does not mention any reference to any exhibit or other section that specifies payment amount.
